title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama CLI and server for running large language models locally with a simple API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama, wrapping the REST API with idiomatic Python.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers, maintained by the Ollama team.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package integrating Ollama models into LangChain LLM, chat, and embeddings interfaces.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama with model management and multi-user support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama providing sync/async APIs and model management.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama server, supporting chat and embeddings.

title: ollama-cli-chat
summary: Interactive CLI chat tool built on Ollama with conversation history and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local AI code completion via Ollama models.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat UI for Ollama with session memory and parameter sliders.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration allowing Ollama models as generators or embedders in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community cookbook of recipes and examples for using Ollama with various frameworks.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and persistent storage.

title: ollama-nvidia-docker
summary: Ready-to-run Docker Compose stack for Ollama with NVIDIA runtime and web UI.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial Rust crate providing strongly typed async bindings to the Ollama API.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord bot that lets users chat with local Ollama models in any guild channel.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for AI-assisted writing using Ollama models inside notes.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app integrating Ollama models as chat endpoints with admin UI for model selection.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings and Chroma vector store with FastAPI backend.

title: ollama-telegram-bot
summary: Telegram bot powered by Ollama with per-user model selection and conversation memory.
